name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-channel-group-mvc-csharp
title: Channel/group tabs in ASP.NET Core with MVC
shortDescription: In this quickstart we'll walk-through creating a custom channel/group tab with ASP.Net Core and MVC. We'll also use App Studio for Microsoft Teams to finalize your app manifest and deploy your tab to Teams.
longDescription: In this quickstart we'll walk-through creating a custom channel/group tab with ASP.Net Core and MVC. We'll also use App Studio for Microsoft Teams to finalize your app manifest and deploy your tab to Teams.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing channel/group tabs in asp.net core with mvc

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
